locations.name: Magic Mountain
locations.description: A lovely little place to go and play some mini golf with friends or zoom around with some go-karts!

locations.name: Buffalo Wild Wings
locations.description: A nice little restaurant featuring wings of a wide variety of spices.  Has a good selection of beer on tap and the televisions always play the best sports games.

locations.name: Champions Golf Course
locations.description: Big, grassy open course reasonable for ameteurs and veterans alike.  Comes with golf cart rentals and scuba gear for retrieving balls in the water traps!
